title: Box Shooter
description: This exciting game puts you in the Tron dimension where you can shoot boxes and balls, but watch out! Some targets will make you lose points. You are on a timer!
instructions: Using your mouse, left click to shoot at the targets within the given time frame. Good luck!

title: Roller Madness
description: Here, you play Rolly-Ball, a cute metallic green ball ready to make some coin. Watch out, there are some enemies on your tail. Don't fall off the platform!
instructions: Using the WASD keys, move around the platform using the environment to catch as many coins as you can.

title: Roller Madness Origins
description: The place where Rolly-Ball first took on the stage! Be prepared for the original Rolly-Ball experience!
instructions: Using the WASD keys, move around the platform using the environment to catch as many coins as you can.

title: Sparty Bros
description: This traditional, but ever so epic side scroller will have you winning the rose!
instructions: Using your arrow keys to walk and the shift key to jump, avoid enemies, and find the coins. To finish the level, you must find the rose.

title: Solar System Simulator
description: This is a calming experience where you can watch our lovely solar system in continuous revolutions.
instructions: Relax. User your left mouse button to click on planets, moons, and the sun. Watch the show.
